definition: gains and losses/success and failure/merits and demerits
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to lose/to miss/to fail
lit. success and failure, the gains and losses (idiom)/fig. to weigh up various factors

sentences.english: I've had a lot of ups and downs in my life.
sentences.chinese: 我认为，每个人的一生都充满着得失成败。

sentences.english: Remember that history, and your children, will judge you.
sentences.chinese: 记住，你的功过得失，历史和后人自会评判。

sentences.english: To measure loss and gain in this wise?
sentences.chinese: 用这种方法来衡量得失？

sentences.english: Second, the literati painters regardless of the pros and cons of honor, always obsessed with painting.
sentences.chinese: 其二，文人画家不管荣辱得失，始终痴迷于绘事。

sentences.english: Xiao Ying focused on analysis of once-popular binary default losses and gains.
sentences.chinese: 肖鹰着重分析了一度走红的二元预设的得失。

sentences.english: I was still balancing the matter in my mind .
sentences.chinese: 我心里正在权衡利害得失。

sentences.english: As long as you don't care about gain and loss, life still have what can't a way to overcome?
sentences.chinese: 只要你不计较得失，人生还有什么不能想法子克服的？

sentences.english: I commor to weigh the pros or cons ago a decision.
sentences.chinese: 在做决定之前，我必需权衡利弊得失。

sentences.english: Gains and losses at work slowly dim view of the heart, no longer complain of.
sentences.chinese: 在工作中得失心慢慢的看淡了，也不再怨天尤人了。

sentences.english: Everyman, there are who can get rid of "gains and losses, " the word it?
sentences.chinese: 凡夫俗子中，有谁能摆脱“得失”二字呢？

sentences.english: I need to weigh the pros and cons before making a decision.
sentences.chinese: 在做决定之前，偶必须权衡利弊得失。

sentences.english: The last discuss the role of music creation and its success or failure.
sentences.chinese: 其三，讨论音乐的创作作用及成败得失。

sentences.english: Thirdly, the models , characteristics and the getting , losing of the Mao Poems' classic.
sentences.chinese: 《毛诗》经学化的模式及其特点与得失。

sentences.english: Gain and loss of its success or failure, already caused the widespread attention of people.
sentences.chinese: 其成败得失，已引起人们的普遍关注。

sentences.english: We create our own thorn, and never stop to count the cost.
sentences.chinese: 我们制造了自己的荆棘，却从不停下来权衡得失。

sentences.english: Marriage gain and loss affects this stock positively and negatively, Waite says.
sentences.chinese: 婚姻的得失会或积极或消极地影响到这个储备系统。

definition: lit. success and failure, the gains and losses (idiom)/fig. to weigh up various factors
honor and disgrace/reputation
success or failure
victory or defeat/result
to choose/to accept or reject
to regard as unimportant/to be indifferent to (fame, wealth etc)/(of an economy or a market) to slacken
position and wealth (idiom); rank, fame and fortune
to worry about personal gains and losses
profit and loss/waxing and waning
to advance or retreat/knowing when to come and when to leave/a sense of propriety
fame and profit
win or loss/outcome
life or death
minor details/trifles
to look forward and back/to consider prudently/overcautious
to haggle over every cent (idiom)
